name: Basic Unit Turn Kit (1–2 Bed)
short_desc: Patch, paint, Decora electrical, LED bulbs, and HVAC filters for standard turns.
includes: DAP Alex Plus white caulk (10.1 oz) ×4
USG Sheetrock Plus 3 joint compound (3.5 qt)
Philips LED A19 60W soft white bulbs ×10

name: Standard Turn + Safety Kit (2–3 Bed)
short_desc: Adds smoke, CO, and GFCI protection for code-compliant unit turns.
includes: Everything in Basic Unit Turn Kit
Leviton Decora white self-test GFCI outlet ×1

name: Premium Turn + Hardware Refresh Kit
short_desc: Visible hardware and bath refresh on top of full safety and turnover coverage.
includes: Everything in Standard Turn + Safety Kit
Kwikset Tylo SmartKey keyed entry knob ×1
